messageBody:
Elliotte,

We were implementing JUnit 4, striving to further simplify, and we realized that we didn't have concrete examples where the example was helpful. I have noted that errors tended to be easy to fix and failures tended to be harder to fix, but we weren't able to find practical implications of this difference.

Sincerely yours,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute
